effect.sun_moon: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.

short_effect.sun_moon: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.
